description: Ride through giant Sequoia trees.  The trail goes through one.  Moderate technical as you drop into the creek then enjoy the trees.  Trail ends at Camp Nelson Bar to rehydrate.
directions: Brom Bakersfiels, nead north on hwy 65 to Portervill.  Head east on hwy 190 past Camp Nelson to Quaking Aspen Campground.  A good place to camp.  The trail starts from the campground and ends in Camp Nelson.
title: Nelson Trail
